body:
Related to [EIP161](http://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-161):

- [EIP168 "Killing dust accounts"](https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/168) will be useful background reference. 
- [EIP169 "Dust account replay security"](https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/169)
- [Parity PR 4757 "EIP-168, 169: Dust protection"](https://github.com/paritytech/parity-ethereum/pull/4757)
- > ["A bunch of transactions were subsequently fired which cleared these spam accounts from the state."](https://github.com/ethereumbook/ethereumbook/issues/477#issuecomment-383556405)
- > ["... the new Geth behavior matches Parityâ€™s, and empty accounts will cease to be a source of concern in general in about one week once the state clearing process finishes."](https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/EIPS/eip-161.md)
- ... ...: anyone know exactly where these contracts are?
